title: How did Intel (INTC) GAAP EPS compare to management’s guidance in each quarter of FY 2024? Format each as “Q[X] FY2024: [X.X]% BEAT/MISS”, rounded to 2 decimals. Use quarterly earnings releases.
description:
1. Firstly, using comparison method: 
 
 Here I have used the formula : Percent vs guidance = [(Actual GAAP EPS − Guided GAAP EPS) / |Guided GAAP EPS|] × 100;
 If Actual is greater than Guidance classify as BEAT otherwise MISS. 
 I then rounded each of the absolute percentages to 2 decimal places.
 
 
 2. Calculate Q1: Actual GAAP EPS = -$0.09 (Q1 FY2024 press release from Apr 25, 2024); 
 Guidance for Q1 GAAP EPS = -$0.25 (Q4 FY2023 press release). 
 Using formula previously stated : ((-0.09+0.25)/|-0.25|))*100 = 64.00% (absolute)
 Since −0.09 > −0.25, Q1 is a BEAT
 Q1 FY2024: 64.00% BEAT.
 
 3. Derive Q2: Actual GAAP EPS = -$0.38 (Q2 FY2024 press release, Aug 1, 2024); Guidance for Q2 GAAP EPS = -$0.05 (Q1 FY2024 press release, Apr 25, 2024). 
 Compute : ((-0.38+0.05)/|-0.05|)) x 100= 660.00% (absolute)
 Q2 FY2024: 660.00% MISS.
 
 4.Compute Q3: Actual GAAP EPS = -$3.88 (Q3 FY2024 press release); 
 Q3 Guidance GAAP EPS = -$0.24 (Q2 FY2024 press release, Aug 1, 2024). 
 
 Calculate: ((-3.88+0.24)/|-0.24|))x100 = 1516.66667% (absolute)
 Actual is much worse than guidance (more negative), so we classify it as a MISS
 Q3 FY2024: 1516.67% MISS
 
 5.Compute Q4: Actual GAAP EPS = -$0.03 (Q4 FY2024 press release)
 
 Guidance for Q4 GAAP EPS = -$0.24 (Q3 FY2024 press release). 
 Compute : ((-0.03+0.24)/|-0.24|)) x 100= 87.50% (absolute)
 Actual is higher than guidance therefore a BEAT 
 Q4 FY2024: 87.50% BEAT
 
 6. Lastly, we display answer as (all to 2 decimal places):
 
 Q1 FY2024: 64.00% BEAT
 Q2 FY2024: 660.00% MISS
 Q3 FY2024: 1516.67% MISS
 Q4 FY2024: 87.50% BEAT

rubric.criteria: Percent vs guidance = [(Actual GAAP EPS − Guided GAAP EPS) / |Guided GAAP EPS|] × 100
If Actual >Guidance classify as BEAT otherwise MISS
States that percentages are rounded to 2 decimal places
Q1 actual GAAP EPS reported as -$0.09
Q1 guidance GAAP EPS reported as -$0.25
Q2 actual GAAP EPS reported as -$0.38
Includes Q2 guidance GAAP EPS reported as -$0.05
Q3 actual GAAP EPS reported as -$3.88
Q3 guidance GAAP EPS reported as -$0.24
Q4 actual GAAP EPS reported as -$0.03
Q4 guidance GAAP EPS reported as -$0.24
